# Sunflower Fibonacci Project

A web-based interactive visualization tool for Fibonacci sunflower patterns.

## Project Type
- Static web project (HTML/CSS/vanilla JavaScript)
- No build tools or frameworks required

## Key Features
- Fibonacci sunflower spiral patterns using the golden angle (137.508Â°)
- Interactive sliders for number of dots, spacing, and dot size
- Millimeter-paper grid background for CAD tracing
- Editable canvas dimensions in millimeters
- SVG/PNG export for CAD workflows

## Development
- Open `index.html` directly in a browser, or use a local dev server
- All logic is in `js/sunflower.js`
- Styles are in `css/style.css`
